urls.title: Geek Fest Film Festival 2021 , Watch Short Films, It's A Short
urls.description: The 1st and LARGEST traveling Geek Film Festival Showcasing the best in geek features, shorts, web series, music videos, fan films, and trailers to Comic Conventions across the globe. In our 1st 7 yrs, GeekFest Film Fests has been programmed in over 50 Pop Culture Conventions and traveled over 150,000 miles to Comic Conventions across North America and presented in the largest Convention in Canada (Fan Expo Canada) and 2nd largest in the US (New York Comic Con) and expanded our reach to Hawaii reaching over 6 million convention-goers in our first seven years! Watch and vote for your favorite short films each day. Come back the first weekend of every month for a new batch of amazing geek genre short films! (Apr, May, June, July) Join us each weekend for a live Q and A with some of that months filmmakers, moderated by Jackie Dallas. Only $ 4.99 for a festival pass and you can watch them all!

data.text: See Robo Wingman Directed by Peter Bune, Dan Fowler part of the @GeekFilmFests Year 8 Tour! TODAY TIX- https://t.co/DNGy36PcXK #SupportIndieFilm #FilmTwitter #ComicCon #FilmFest #animation https://t.co/rbIwF1mCPe
